about_the_game:
Try to survive in a dystopian future version of Europe that has been devastated by a global energy crisis. Embark on dangerous missions, gather essential resources, and expand your camp to rediscover your place in this broken world.

Use cards to defeat enemies!



Decide which cards you want to play. Different playstyles work against different enemies, so be careful what cards you choose!

A vibrant variety of cards!



Deckbuilding is the heart of Kind Nature - each card opens up new opportunities. Collect a wide variety of attack, support or defense cards for your deck. Improve your character with powerful equipment cards and get stronger cards by collecting Runner Points with Runner cards.

Develop your camp



Research, craft and upgrade your cards in the survivor camp. Spend your resources to expand your camp with new buildings to unlock more cards. Upgrade buildings and increase your chances of surviving the next mission.

Deckbuilding during battle!



Use your animal companion to retrieve cards from a pre-selected, custom card pool. This adds another strategic level to combat as you balance offensive and defensive cards while building a stronger deck during your battles.

Varied gameplay loop



Complete missions, battle enemies, and encounter various events. Progress by gathering resources, recruiting survivors, and befriending wildlife. Return to your camp and use the collected resources to upgrade buildings, recycle unwanted cards, and create new cards for your deck.

short_description: Kind Nature is a post-apocalyptic roguelike deckbuilding game set in europe. As one of the last survivors of a harsh world, you'll embark on dangerous missions to gather resources, fight enemies, and expand your camp. In this shattered world, will you find a place to call home?
